trans-unit.source: 'Authenticate with your own identity' is not an allowed method for Microsoft Personal accounts.
trans-unit.target: 'Authenticate with your own identity' is not an allowed method for Microsoft Personal accounts.

trans-unit.source: *O365 will automatically refresh the token for you on either authentication method. The refresh token lasts 90 days but it's refreshed on each connection so as long as you connect within 90 days you can have unlimited access.
trans-unit.target: *O365 will automatically refresh the token for you on either authentication method. The refresh token lasts 90 days but it's refreshed on each connection so as long as you connect within 90 days you can have unlimited access.

trans-unit.source: 60 Minutes without refresh token or 90 days*
Authenticate with your own identity: This will use your own identity (the app identity). This oauth flow is called client credentials grant flow.
trans-unit.target: Authenticate with your own identity: This will use your own identity (the app identity). This oauth flow is called client credentials grant flow.

trans-unit.source: Authenticate on behalf of a user (public): Same as the former but for public apps where the client secret can't be secured. Client secret is not required.
trans-unit.target: Authenticate on behalf of a user (public): Same as the former but for public apps where the client secret can't be secured. Client secret is not required.

trans-unit.source: Authenticate on behalf of a user: Any user will give consent to the app to access it's resources. This oauth flow is called authorization code grant flow. This is the default authentication method used by this library.
trans-unit.target: Authenticate on behalf of a user: Any user will give consent to the app to access it's resources. This oauth flow is called authorization code grant flow. This is the default authentication method used by this library.

trans-unit.source: FileSystemTokenBackend (Default backend): Stores and retrieves tokens from the file system. Tokens are stored as files.
trans-unit.target: FileSystemTokenBackend (Default backend): Stores and retrieves tokens from the file system. Tokens are stored as files.

trans-unit.source: FirestoreTokenBackend: Stores and retrives tokens from a Google Firestore Datastore. Tokens are stored as documents within a collection.
trans-unit.target: FirestoreTokenBackend : Stores and retrives tokens from a Google Firestore Datastore. Tokens are stored as documents within a collection.

trans-unit.source: account.is_authenticated property will try to load the token if is not already loaded.
trans-unit.target: account.is_authenticated property will try to load the token if is not already loaded.

trans-unit.source: connection.get_session: this method is called when there isn't a request session set. By default it will not try to load the token. Set load_token=True to load it.
trans-unit.target: connection.get_session : this method is called when there isn't a request session set. By default it will not try to load the token. Set load_token=True to load it.

trans-unit.source: connection.refresh_token: by default will store the token. To avoid it change connection.store_token to False. This however it's a global setting (that only affects the refresh_token method). If you only want the next refresh operation to not store the token you will have to set it back to True afterwards.
trans-unit.target: connection.refresh_token : by default will store the token. To avoid it change connection.store_token to False. This however it's a global setting (that only affects the refresh_token method). If you only want the next refresh operation to not store the token you will have to set it back to True afterwards.

trans-unit.source: connection.request_token: by default will store the token, but you can set store_token=False to avoid it.
trans-unit.target: connection.request_token : by default will store the token, but you can set store_token=False to avoid it.

trans-unit.source: load_token: this should load the token from the desired backend and return a Token instance or None
trans-unit.target: load_token : this should load the token from the desired backend and return a Token instance or None

trans-unit.source: save_token: this should store the self.token in the desired backend.
trans-unit.target: save_token : this should store the self.token in the desired backend.

trans-unit.source: 'me': the user which has given consent. the default for every protocol. Overwritten when using "with your own identity" authentication method (Only available on the authorization auth_flow_type).
trans-unit.target: 'me': the user which has given consent. the default for every protocol. Overwritten when using "with your own identity" authentication method (Only available on the authorization auth_flow_type).

trans-unit.source: 'user:user@domain.com': a shared mailbox or a user account for which you have permissions. If you don't provide 'user:' will be infered anyways.
trans-unit.target: 'user:user@domain.com': a shared mailbox or a user account for which you have permissions. If you don't provide 'user:' will be infered anyways.

trans-unit.source: False: then the Connection will NOT refresh the token.
trans-unit.target: False: then the Connection will NOT refresh the token.

trans-unit.source: Important: In case you can't secure the client secret you can use the auth flow type 'public' which only requires the client id.
trans-unit.target: Important: In case you can't secure the client secret you can use the auth flow type 'public' which only requires the client id.

trans-unit.source: None: then this method already executed the refresh and therefore the Connection does not have to.
trans-unit.target: None: then this method already executed the refresh and therefore the Connection does not have to.

trans-unit.source: Take care: the access (and refresh) token must remain protected from unauthorized users.
trans-unit.target: Take care: the access (and refresh) token must remain protected from unauthorized users.

trans-unit.source: Tip: When using MacOs the console is limited to 1024 characters. If your url has multiple scopes it can exceed this limit. To solve this. Just import readline a the top of your script.
trans-unit.target: Tip: When using MacOs the console is limited to 1024 characters. If your url has multiple scopes it can exceed this limit. To solve this. Just import readline a the top of your script.

trans-unit.source: True: then the Connection will refresh the token.
trans-unit.target: True: then the Connection will refresh the token.

trans-unit.source: A Drive will allow you to work with Folders and Files.
trans-unit.target: A Drive will allow you to work with Folders and Files.

trans-unit.source: A Schedule instance can list and create calendars. It can also list or create events on the default user calendar. To use other calendars use a Calendar instance.
trans-unit.target: A Schedule instance can list and create calendars. It can also list or create events on the default user calendar. To use other calendars use a Calendar instance.

trans-unit.source: A User instance contains by default the basic properties of the user. If you want to include more, you will have to select the desired properties manually.
trans-unit.target: A User instance contains by default the basic properties of the user. If you want to include more, you will have to select the desired properties manually.

trans-unit.source: A common pattern to check for authentication and use the library is this one:
trans-unit.target: 常见的检查认证和使用库的模式是这样的。

trans-unit.source: A query helper to help you build custom OData queries (filter, order, select and search).
trans-unit.target: 一个查询助手,帮助你建立自定义的OData查询(过滤、排序、选择和搜索)。

trans-unit.source: Access the user resources, and any shared resources
trans-unit.target: 访问用户资源和任何共享资源

trans-unit.source: Actually there are only two implemented (but you can easely implement more like a CookieBackend, RedisBackend, etc.):
trans-unit.target: 其实只实现了两个(但你可以很容易地实现更多的像CookieBackend、RedisBackend等)。

trans-unit.source: AddressBook groups the funcionality of both the Contact Folders and Contacts. Outlook Distribution Groups are not supported (By the Microsoft API's).
trans-unit.target: AddressBook对联系人文件夹和联系人的功能进行了分组。Outlook 分发组不支持(由微软的API)。

trans-unit.source: After creating the WorkBook instance you will have access to the following objects:
trans-unit.target: After creating the WorkBook instance you will have access to the following objects:

trans-unit.source: All Azure AD users the app has access to
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以访问的所有 Azure AD 用户

trans-unit.source: Almost Full Support for MsGraph and Office 365 Rest Api.
trans-unit.target: 几乎全面支持MsGraph和Office 365 Rest Api。

trans-unit.source: An email object with all it's data and methods.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含所有数据和方法的电子邮件对象。

trans-unit.source: And now using the same example using FirestoreTokenBackend:
trans-unit.target: 而现在使用同样的例子,使用FirestoreTokenBackend。

trans-unit.source: As an example, to read and send emails use:
trans-unit.target: 举个例子,阅读和发送邮件使用。

trans-unit.source: At this point you will have an access token stored that will provide valid credentials when using the api.
trans-unit.target: 在这一点上,你将存储一个访问令牌,它将在使用api时提供有效的凭证。

trans-unit.source: Automatic handling between local datetimes and server datetimes. Work with your local datetime and let this library do the rest.
trans-unit.target: 自动处理本地日期时间和服务器日期时间。使用你的本地日期时间,让这个库来完成剩下的工作。

trans-unit.source: Basic Permision needed is Users.ReadBasic.All (limit info)
trans-unit.target: 需要的基本权限是Users.ReadBasic.All(限制信息)。

trans-unit.source: Both Files and Folders are DriveItems. Both Image and Photo are Files, but Photo is also an Image. All have some different methods and properties. Take care when using 'is_xxxx'.
trans-unit.target: 文件和文件夹都是 DriveItems。图像和照片都是文件,但照片也是一个图像。都有一些不同的方法和属性。使用'is_xxxx'时要注意。

trans-unit.source: Both protocols are similar but consider the following:
trans-unit.target: 两种协议都是类似的,但要考虑以下几点。

trans-unit.source: But you can also work only with the pieces you want.
trans-unit.target: 但你也可以只用你想要的作品。

trans-unit.source: By default this always returns True as it's asuming there is are no parallel connections running at once.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,这个选项总是返回True,因为它假设没有并行连接同时运行。

trans-unit.source: By setting the resource prefix (such as 'user:' or 'group:') you help the library understand the type of resource. You can also pass it like 'users/example@exampl.com'. Same applies to the other resource prefixes.
trans-unit.target: By setting the resource prefix (such as 'user:' or 'group:') you help the library understand the type of resource. You can also pass it like 'users/example@exampl.com'. Same applies to the other resource prefixes.

trans-unit.source: Call account.authenticate and pass the scopes you want (the ones you previously added on the app registration portal).
trans-unit.target: Call account.authenticate and pass the scopes you want (the ones you previously added on the app registration portal).

trans-unit.source: Call account.authenticate. This call will request a token for you and store it in the backend. No user interaction is needed. The method will store the token in the backend and return True if the authentication succeeded.
trans-unit.target: Call account.authenticate . This call will request a token for you and store it in the backend. No user interaction is needed. The method will store the token in the backend and return True if the authentication succeeded.

trans-unit.source: Carefull: there's no way to identify that an attachment is in fact a message. You can only check if the attachment.attachment_type == 'item'. if is of type "item" then it can be a message (or an event, etc...). You will have to determine this yourself.
trans-unit.target: 注意:没有办法识别一个附件实际上是一个消息,你只能检查附件.attachment_type =='item'.你只能检查attachment.attachment_type =='item'.如果是 "item "类型,那么它可能是一个消息(或一个事件,等等...)。你必须自己确定这一点。

trans-unit.source: Change between different resource with ease: access shared mailboxes, other users resources, sharepoint resources, etc.
trans-unit.target: 在不同资源之间轻松切换:访问共享邮箱、其他用户资源、Sharepoint资源等。

trans-unit.source: Check The Global Address List for further information.
trans-unit.target: Check The Global Address List for further information.

trans-unit.source: Click on the Grant Admin Consent button (if you have admin permissions) or wait until the admin has given consent to your application.
trans-unit.target: 点击 "授予管理员同意 "按钮(如果你有管理员权限),或者等待管理员同意你的申请。

trans-unit.source: Client Id, Client Secret, Authorization Code

trans-unit.target: 基于控制台的认证界面。

trans-unit.source: Create an app. Set a name.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个应用程序。设置一个名字。

trans-unit.source: Creating a draft message is as easy as this:
trans-unit.target: 创建一个信息草案就像这样简单。

trans-unit.source: Delegated Permissions (on behalf of the user)
Detailed usage documentation is still in progress
trans-unit.target: 详细的使用文档仍在编写中

trans-unit.source: Each API endpoint requires a resource. This usually defines the owner of the data. Every protocol defaults to resource 'ME'. 'ME' is the user which has given consent, but you can change this behaviour by providing a different default resource to the protocol constructor.
trans-unit.target: 每个API端点都需要一个资源。这通常定义了数据的所有者。每个协议都默认为资源'ME'。'ME'是已经同意的用户,但你可以通过向协议构造函数提供不同的默认资源来改变这种行为。

trans-unit.source: Every ApiComponent (such as MailBox) implements a new_query method that will return a Query instance. This Query instance can handle the filtering, sorting, selecting, expanding and search very easily.
trans-unit.target: Every ApiComponent (such as MailBox ) implements a new_query method that will return a Query instance. This Query instance can handle the filtering, sorting, selecting, expanding and search very easily.

trans-unit.source: Everything returned from an AddressBook instance is a Contact instance. Contacts have all the information stored as attributes
trans-unit.target: Everything returned from an AddressBook instance is a Contact instance. Contacts have all the information stored as attributes

trans-unit.source: Finally you can configure any other flow by using connection.get_authorization_url and connection.request_token as you want.
trans-unit.target: Finally you can configure any other flow by using connection.get_authorization_url and connection.request_token as you want.

trans-unit.source: Finally, you can mix and match "protocol scopes" with "scope helpers". Go to the procotol section to know more about them.
trans-unit.target: Finally, you can mix and match "protocol scopes" with "scope helpers". Go to the procotol section to know more about them.

trans-unit.source: First ensure you are using an appropiate TokenBackend to store the auth tokens (See Token storage below).
trans-unit.target: 首先确保你使用一个合适的 TokenBackend 来存储 auth token (参见下面的 Token 存储)。

trans-unit.target: 例如(按照之前添加的权限)。

For example when accessing a shared mailbox:

For example your application can have Calendar.Read, Mail.ReadWrite and Mail.Send permissions, but the application can request access only to the Mail.ReadWrite and Mail.Send permission. This is done by providing scopes to the Account instance or account.authenticate method like so:
trans-unit.target: For example your application can have Calendar.Read, Mail.ReadWrite and Mail.Send permissions, but the application can request access only to the Mail.ReadWrite and Mail.Send permission. This is done by providing scopes to the Account instance or account.authenticate method like so:

trans-unit.source: For some unknow reason, microsoft does not allow to upload an attachment at the event creation time (as opposed with message attachments). See this. So, to upload attachments to Events, first save the event, then attach the message and save again.
trans-unit.target: For some unknow reason, microsoft does not allow to upload an attachment at the event creation time (as opposed with message attachments). See this. So, to upload attachments to Events, first save the event, then attach the message and save again.

trans-unit.source: From a handler redirect the user to the Microsoft login url. Provide a callback. Store the state.
trans-unit.target: 从一个处理程序将用户重定向到微软的登录网址。提供一个回调。存储状态。

trans-unit.source: From the callback handler complete the authentication with the state and other data.
trans-unit.target: 从回调处理程序中用状态和其他数据完成验证。

trans-unit.source: Full Permision is Users.Read.All but needs admin consent.
trans-unit.target: 完全权限是Users.Read.All,但需要管理员同意。

trans-unit.source: Full oauth support with automatic handling of refresh tokens.
trans-unit.target: 全面支持oauth,自动处理刷新代币。

trans-unit.source: Good Abstraction layer between each Api. Change the api (Graph vs Office365) and don't worry about the api internal implementation.
trans-unit.target: 每个Api之间有很好的抽象层。改变api(Graph与Office365),不用担心api内部实现。

trans-unit.source: HttpErrors 4xx (Bad Request) and 5xx (Internal Server Error) are considered exceptions and raised also by the connection. You can tell the Connection to not raise http errors by passing raise_http_errors=False (defaults to True).
trans-unit.target: HttpErrors 4xx (Bad Request) and 5xx (Internal Server Error) are considered exceptions and raised also by the connection. You can tell the Connection to not raise http errors by passing raise_http_errors=False (defaults to True).

trans-unit.source: If you do a search on messages and specify only a value without specific message properties, the search is carried out on the default search properties of from, subject, and body.
trans-unit.target: 如果对消息进行搜索,只指定值而不指定具体的消息属性,则会在默认的from、subject、body等搜索属性上进行搜索。

trans-unit.source: In Supported account types choose "Accounts in any organizational directory and personal Microsoft accounts (e.g. Skype, Xbox, Outlook.com)", if you are using a personal account.
trans-unit.target: 在支持的账户类型中选择 "任何组织目录中的账户和个人微软账户(如Skype、Xbox、Outlook.com)",如果你使用的是个人账户。

trans-unit.source: Instantiate an Account object with the credentials (client id and client secret), specifying the parameter auth_flow_type to "credentials". You also need to provide a 'tenant_id'. You don't need to specify any scopes.
trans-unit.target: Instantiate an Account object with the credentials (client id and client secret), specifying the parameter auth_flow_type to "credentials". You also need to provide a 'tenant_id'. You don't need to specify any scopes.

trans-unit.source: Instantiate an Account object with the credentials (client id and client secret).
trans-unit.target: Instantiate an Account object with the credentials (client id and client secret).

trans-unit.source: Instead of defining the resource used at the account or protocol level, you can provide it per use case as follows:
trans-unit.target: 您可以按以下方式为每个用例提供资源,而不是在账户或协议级别上定义使用的资源。

trans-unit.source: It can access more resources over Office 365 (for example OneDrive)
trans-unit.target: 它可以通过Office 365访问更多资源(例如OneDrive)。

trans-unit.source: It can send emails with attachments up to 150 MB. MSGraph only allows 4MB on each request (UPDATE: Starting 22 October'19 you can upload files up to 150MB with MSGraphProtocol beta version)
trans-unit.target: It can send emails with attachments up to 150 MB. MSGraph only allows 4MB on each request (UPDATE: Starting 22 October'19 you can upload files up to 150MB with MSGraphProtocol beta version)

trans-unit.source: It is highly recommended to add "offline_access" permission. If not the user you will have to re-authenticate every hour.
trans-unit.target: 强烈建议添加 "offline_access "权限。如果不是用户,你将不得不每小时重新认证一次。

trans-unit.source: It is highly recommended to add the "offline_access" permission and request this scope when authenticating. Otherwise the library will only have access to the user resources for 1 hour. See Permissions and Scopes.
trans-unit.target: It is highly recommended to add the "offline_access" permission and request this scope when authenticating. Otherwise the library will only have access to the user resources for 1 hour. See Permissions and Scopes.

trans-unit.source: It is the recommended Protocol by Microsoft.
It's also easy to implement a custom Class.

It's important to know that when querying events with include_recurring=True (which is the default), it is required that you must provide a query parameter with the start and end attributes defined. Unlike when using include_recurring=False those attributes will NOT filter the data based on the operations you set on the query (greater_equal, less, etc.) but just filter the events start datetime between the provided start and end datetimes.
trans-unit.target: It's important to know that when querying events with include_recurring=True (which is the default), it is required that you must provide a query parameter with the start and end attributes defined. Unlike when using include_recurring=False those attributes will NOT filter the data based on the operations you set on the query (greater_equal, less, etc.) but just filter the events start datetime between the provided start and end datetimes.

trans-unit.source: Just Inherit from ApiComponent, define the endpoints, and use the connection to make requests. If needed also inherit from Protocol to handle different comunications aspects with the API server.
trans-unit.target: Just Inherit from ApiComponent , define the endpoints, and use the connection to make requests. If needed also inherit from Protocol to handle different comunications aspects with the API server.

trans-unit.source: Mailbox groups the funcionality of both the messages and the email folders.
trans-unit.target: 邮箱对邮件和邮件文件夹的功能进行分组。

trans-unit.source: Messages and attached messages can be saved as *.eml.
trans-unit.target: 信息和附加信息可保存为*.eml。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Graph and Office 365 API made easy
trans-unit.target: 微软图形和Office 365 API变得简单

trans-unit.source: Modular ApiComponents can be created and built to achieve further functionality.
trans-unit.target: 可以创建和构建模块化的ApiComponents来实现更多的功能。

trans-unit.source: Note that only message headers and other properties added to the select statement will be present.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,只有添加到选择语句的消息头和其他属性才会出现。

trans-unit.source: Note: If you latter on change the scopes requested, the current token will be invaled and you will have to re-authenticate. The user that logins will be asked for consent.
trans-unit.target: 注意:如果你后来改变了所要求的范围,当前的令牌将失效,你将不得不重新认证。登录的用户将被要求同意。

trans-unit.source: Note: When passing scopes at the Account initialization or on the account.authenticate method, the scope helpers are autommatically converted to the protocol flavor. Those are the only places where you can use scope helpers. Any other object using scopes (such as the Connection object) expects scopes that are already set for the protocol.
trans-unit.target: Note: When passing scopes at the Account initialization or on the account.authenticate method, the scope helpers are autommatically converted to the protocol flavor. Those are the only places where you can use scope helpers. Any other object using scopes (such as the Connection object) expects scopes that are already set for the protocol.

trans-unit.source: Note: When using the "with your own identity" authentication method the resource 'ME' is overwritten to be blank as the authentication method already states that you are login with your own identity.
trans-unit.target: 注意:当使用 "用自己的身份 "认证方式时,资源 "ME "将被覆盖为空白,因为该认证方式已经说明你是用自己的身份登录。

trans-unit.source: Note: You only need the scopes when login as those are kept stored within the token on the token backend.
trans-unit.target: 注意:您只需要在登录时使用作用域,因为这些作用域会保存在令牌后台的令牌中。

trans-unit.source: Note: when using the "on behalf of a user" authentication, you can pass the scopes to either the Account init or to the authenticate method. Either way is correct.
trans-unit.target: Note: when using the "on behalf of a user" authentication, you can pass the scopes to either the Account init or to the authenticate method. Either way is correct.
关于日历和活动的说明:

trans-unit.source: O365 - Microsoft Graph and Office 365 API made easy
trans-unit.target: O365-微软图形和Office 365 API变得简单。

trans-unit.source: O365 is available on pypi.org. Simply run pip install O365 to install it.
trans-unit.target: O365 is available on pypi.org. Simply run pip install O365 to install it.

trans-unit.source: Office 365 API (Nor MS Graph API) has no concept such as the Outlook Global Address List. However you can use the Users API to access all the users within your organization.
trans-unit.target: Office 365 API (Nor MS Graph API) has no concept such as the Outlook Global Address List. However you can use the Users API to access all the users within your organization.
只有在某些高级权限下

trans-unit.source: Pagination support through a custom iterator that handles future requests automatically. Request Infinite items!
trans-unit.target: 通过自定义迭代器支持分页,自动处理未来的请求。请求无限的项目
通过pip安装的项目依赖关系。

trans-unit.source: Protocols handles the aspects of communications between different APIs. This project uses either the Microsoft Graph APIs (by default) or the Office 365 APIs. But, you can use many other Microsoft APIs as long as you implement the protocol needed.
trans-unit.target: Protocols处理不同API之间的通信方面。这个项目使用的是Microsoft Graph APIs(默认情况下)或Office 365 APIs。但是,只要你实现了所需的协议,你可以使用许多其他的微软API。

trans-unit.source: Represents a Folder within your email mailbox.
trans-unit.target: Represents a Folder within your email mailbox.

trans-unit.source: Represents a Folder within your Contacts Section in Office 365. AddressBook class represents the parent folder (it's a folder itself).
trans-unit.target: 代表 Office 365 中联系人部分中的一个文件夹。AddressBook类代表父文件夹(它本身就是一个文件夹)。

trans-unit.source: Scope implementation depends on the protocol used. So by using protocol data you can automatically set the scopes needed. This is implemented by using 'scope helpers'. Those are little helpers that group scope functionallity and abstract the procotol used.
trans-unit.target: 范围的实现取决于所使用的协议。所以通过使用协议数据,你可以自动设置所需的作用域。这是通过使用 "scope helpers "来实现的。这些小助手将作用域的功能进行分组,并将使用的程序抽象化。

trans-unit.source: Set format for a given range

Set the redirect uri (Web) to: https://login.microsoftonline.com/common/oauth2/nativeclient and click register. This needs to be inserted into the "Redirect URI" text box as simply checking the check box next to this link seems to be insufficent. This is the default redirect uri used by this library, but you can use any other if you want.
trans-unit.target: Set the redirect uri (Web) to: https://login.microsoftonline.com/common/oauth2/nativeclient and click register. This needs to be inserted into the "Redirect URI" text box as simply checking the check box next to this link seems to be insufficent. This is the default redirect uri used by this library, but you can use any other if you want.

trans-unit.source: The Storage class handles all functionality around One Drive and Document Library Storage in Sharepoint.
trans-unit.target: The Storage class handles all functionality around One Drive and Document Library Storage in Sharepoint.

trans-unit.source: The Storage instance allows to retrieve Drive instances which handles all the Files and Folders from within the selected Storage. Usually you will only need to work with the default drive. But the Storage instances can handle multiple drives.
trans-unit.target: The Storage instance allows to retrieve Drive instances which handles all the Files and Folders from within the selected Storage . Usually you will only need to work with the default drive. But the Storage instances can handle multiple drives.

trans-unit.source: The authenticate method will print into the console a url that you will have to visit to achieve authentication. Then after visiting the link and authenticate you will have to paste back the resulting url into the console. The method will return True and print a message if it was succesful.
trans-unit.target: The authenticate method will print into the console a url that you will have to visit to achieve authentication. Then after visiting the link and authenticate you will have to paste back the resulting url into the console. The method will return True and print a message if it was succesful.

trans-unit.source: The should_refresh_token method is intended to be implemented for environments where multiple Connection instances are running on paralel. This method should check if it's time to refresh the token or not. The chosen backend can store a flag somewhere to answer this question. This can avoid race conditions between different instances trying to refresh the token at once, when only one should make the refresh. The method should return three posible values:
trans-unit.target: The should_refresh_token method is intended to be implemented for environments where multiple Connection instances are running on paralel. This method should check if it's time to refresh the token or not. The chosen backend can store a flag somewhere to answer this question. This can avoid race conditions between different instances trying to refresh the token at once, when only one should make the refresh. The method should return three posible values:

trans-unit.source: The Directory object can retrieve users.
trans-unit.target: 目录对象可以检索用户。

trans-unit.source: The access token only lasts 60 minutes, but the app try will automatically request new access tokens.
trans-unit.target: The access token only lasts 60 minutes, but the app try will automatically request new access tokens.

trans-unit.source: The calendar and events functionality is group in a Schedule object.
trans-unit.target: The calendar and events functionality is group in a Schedule object.

trans-unit.source: The default is to use a session in a persistent way. Sessions expire after some time of inactivity. When working with persistent sessions, new sessions will automatically be created when old ones expire.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下是以持久化的方式使用会话。会话在一段时间不活动后就会过期。当使用持久化会话时,当旧的会话过期时,会自动创建新的会话。

trans-unit.source: The default protocol used by the Account Class is MSGraphProtocol.
trans-unit.target: The default protocol used by the Account Class is MSGraphProtocol .

trans-unit.source: The first step to be able to work with this library is to register an application and retrieve the auth token. See Authentication.
trans-unit.target: The first step to be able to work with this library is to register an application and retrieve the auth token. See Authentication.

trans-unit.source: The following example is done using Flask.
trans-unit.target: 下面的例子是用Flask完成的。

trans-unit.source: The library will call (at different stages) the token backend methods to load and save the token.
trans-unit.target: 该库将调用(在不同阶段)令牌后端方法来加载和保存令牌。

trans-unit.source: The planner api is done but there are no docs yet. Look at the planner.py file to get insights.
trans-unit.target: planner api已经完成,但还没有文档。请看planner.py文件来了解情况。

trans-unit.source: The planner functionality requires Administrator Permission.
trans-unit.target: 规划师功能需要管理员权限。

trans-unit.source: The project is currently developed and maintained by Janscas.
trans-unit.target: The project is currently developed and maintained by Janscas.

trans-unit.source: The scopes needed to work with the WorkBook and Excel related classes are the same used by OneDrive.
trans-unit.target: The scopes needed to work with the WorkBook and Excel related classes are the same used by OneDrive.

trans-unit.source: The scopes only matter when using the "on behalf of a user" authentication method.
trans-unit.target: 只有在使用 "代表用户 "的认证方法时,作用域才有意义。

trans-unit.target: sharepoint api已经完成,但还没有文档。请看sharepoint.py文件来了解情况。

trans-unit.source: The user must then visit this url and give consent to the application. When consent is given, the page will rediret to: "https://login.microsoftonline.com/common/oauth2/nativeclient" by default (you can change this) with a url query param called 'code'.
trans-unit.target: The user must then visit this url and give consent to the application. When consent is given, the page will rediret to: "https://login.microsoftonline.com/common/oauth2/nativeclient" by default (you can change this) with a url query param called 'code'.

trans-unit.source: The user of this library can then request access to one or more of this resources by providing scopes to the oauth provider.
trans-unit.target: 然后,该库的用户可以通过向oauth提供者提供作用域来请求访问该资源的一个或多个。

trans-unit.source: Then the user must copy the resulting page url and paste it back on the console. The method will then return True if the login attempt was succesful.
trans-unit.target: 然后用户必须复制结果页面的url并粘贴回控制台。如果登录尝试成功,该方法将返回True。

trans-unit.source: Then you need to login for the first time to get the access token that will grant access to the user resources.
trans-unit.target: 然后,你需要首次登录获得访问令牌,以获得对用户资源的访问权。

trans-unit.source: This project aims is to make interact with Microsoft Graph and Office 365 easy to do in a Pythonic way. Access to Email, Calendar, Contacts, OneDrive, etc. Are easy to do in a way that feel easy and straight forward to beginners and feels just right to seasoned python programmer.
trans-unit.target: 这个项目的目的是用Pythonic的方式让与Microsoft Graph和Office 365的交互变得简单。访问电子邮件,日历,联系人,OneDrive等。是容易做的方式,感觉容易和直接向前的初学者和感觉恰到好处的经验丰富的python程序员。

trans-unit.source: This project was also a learning resource for us. This is a list of not so common python idioms used in this project:
trans-unit.target: 这个项目对我们来说也是一种学习资源。这是本项目中使用的不常见的python成语列表。

trans-unit.source: This section is explained using Microsoft Graph Protocol, almost the same applies to the Office 365 REST API.
trans-unit.target: 本节使用Microsoft Graph协议进行解释,几乎同样适用于Office 365 REST API。

trans-unit.source: Timezone conversion and timezone aware datetimes
trans-unit.target: 时区转换和时区感知日期

trans-unit.source: To acomplish the authentication you can basically use different approaches. The following apply to the "on behalf of a user" authentication method as this is 2-step authentication flow. For the "with your own identity" authentication method, you can just use account.authenticate as it's not going to require a console input.
trans-unit.target: To acomplish the authentication you can basically use different approaches. The following apply to the "on behalf of a user" authentication method as this is 2-step authentication flow. For the "with your own identity" authentication method, you can just use account.authenticate as it's not going to require a console input.

trans-unit.source: To allow authentication you first need to register your application at Azure App Registrations.
trans-unit.target: To allow authentication you first need to register your application at Azure App Registrations.

trans-unit.source: To authenticate (login) you can use different authentication interfaces. On the following examples we will be using the Console Based Interface but you can use any one.
trans-unit.target: To authenticate (login) you can use different authentication interfaces. On the following examples we will be using the Console Based Interface but you can use any one.

trans-unit.source: To only read all the files the user has access
trans-unit.target: 只读取用户有权访问的所有文件。

trans-unit.source: To only read another user / shared mailbox calendars
trans-unit.target: 只读取其他用户/共享邮箱的日历。

trans-unit.source: To only read another user / shared mailbox contacts
trans-unit.target: 只读取另一个用户/共享邮箱的通讯录

trans-unit.source: To only read another user / shared mailboxes
trans-unit.target: 只读其他用户/共享邮箱

trans-unit.source: To only read basic properties from users of my organization (User.Read.All requires administrator consent).
trans-unit.target: 只读取我组织用户的基本属性(User.Read.All需要管理员同意)。

trans-unit.source: To only read my personal calendars
To only read my personal contacts
trans-unit.target: 只读取我的个人联系人

trans-unit.source: To only read sites, lists and items
trans-unit.target: 只阅读网站、列表和项目

trans-unit.source: To only send message as another user / shared mailbox
trans-unit.target: 只以另一个用户/共享邮箱的身份发送邮件。

trans-unit.source: To read and save all the files the user has access
trans-unit.target: 读取和保存用户有权限的所有文件。

trans-unit.source: To read and save calendars from another user / shared mailbox
trans-unit.target: 从其他用户/共享邮箱读取和保存日历。

trans-unit.source: To read and save contacts from another user / shared mailbox
trans-unit.target: 读取和保存其他用户/共享邮箱中的联系人。

trans-unit.source: To read and save messages in another user / shared mailbox
trans-unit.target: 读取和保存其他用户/共享邮箱中的信息。

trans-unit.source: To read and save messages in my mailbox
trans-unit.target: 要阅读和保存我的邮箱中的信息

trans-unit.source: To read and save my files
To read and save personal calendars
To read and save personal contacts
trans-unit.target: 读取和保存个人联系人

trans-unit.source: To read and save sites, lists and items
trans-unit.target: 阅读和保存网站、列表和项目

trans-unit.source: To read and write outlook settings
To retrieve a contact by their email:
trans-unit.target: 要通过他们的电子邮件检索一个联系人。

trans-unit.source: To search the Global Address List (Users API):
trans-unit.target: 搜索全球地址列表(用户API)。

trans-unit.source: To store the token you will have to provide a properly configured TokenBackend.
trans-unit.target: 为了存储令牌,你必须提供一个正确配置的 TokenBackend。

trans-unit.source: To work with excel files, first you have to retrieve a File instance using the OneDrive or Sharepoint functionallity.
trans-unit.target: To work with excel files, first you have to retrieve a File instance using the OneDrive or Sharepoint functionallity.

trans-unit.source: Under "Certificates & secrets", generate a new client secret. Set the expiration preferably to never. Write down the value of the client secret created now. It will be hidden later on.
trans-unit.target: Under "Certificates & secrets", generate a new client secret. Set the expiration preferably to never. Write down the value of the client secret created now. It will be hidden later on.

trans-unit.source: Under the "on behalf of a user" authentication method, if you change the scope requested, then the current token won't work, and you will need the user to give consent again on the application to gain access to the new scopes requested.
trans-unit.target: 在 "代表用户 "的身份验证方式下,如果你改变了所请求的范围,那么当前的令牌将无法工作,你需要用户在应用程序上再次给予同意,以获得对所请求的新范围的访问。

trans-unit.source: Unlimited if there is a refresh token and as long as a re
trans-unit.target: 如果有刷新令牌,而且只要有刷新令牌,就不受限制。

trans-unit.source: Unlimited if there is a refresh token and as long as a refresh is done within the 90 days
trans-unit.target: 如果有刷新令牌,且在90天内完成刷新,则无限制。

trans-unit.source: Usually you will only need to work with the Account Class. This is a wrapper around all functionality.
trans-unit.target: Usually you will only need to work with the Account Class. This is a wrapper around all functionality.

trans-unit.source: Usually you will work with the default 'ME' resource, but you can also use one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 通常你会使用默认的 "ME "资源,但你也可以使用以下资源之一。

trans-unit.source: We are always open to new pull requests!
trans-unit.target: 我们随时欢迎新的拉取请求

trans-unit.source: What follows is kind of a wiki...
When authenticating "on behalf of a user":
trans-unit.target: 当 "代表用户 "进行认证时。

trans-unit.source: When authenticating on behalf of a user:
trans-unit.target: 代表用户进行身份验证时。

trans-unit.source: When authenticating with your own identity:
trans-unit.target: 用自己的身份进行认证时。

trans-unit.source: When authenticating you will retrieve oauth tokens. If you don't want a one time access you will have to store the token somewhere. O365 makes no assumptions on where to store the token and tries to abstract this from the library usage point of view.
trans-unit.target: 当认证时,你将检索oauth令牌。如果你不想一次性访问,你将不得不将令牌存储在某个地方。O365对存储令牌的位置不做任何假设,并试图从库使用的角度来抽象这个问题。

trans-unit.source: When copying a DriveItem the api can return a direct copy of the item or a pointer to a resource that will inform on the progress of the copy operation.
trans-unit.target: 当复制 DriveItem 时,api 可以返回该项目的直接副本,或者返回一个指向资源的指针,该指针将告知复制操作的进度。

trans-unit.source: When interacting with excel, you can use a workbook session to efficiently make changes in a persistent or nonpersistent way. This sessions become usefull if you perform numerous changes to the excel file.
trans-unit.target: 当与excel进行交互时,你可以使用工作簿会话来有效地以持久性或非持久性的方式进行更改。如果你对excel文件进行了大量的修改,这个会话就变得很有用。

trans-unit.source: When this is the case, the methods in this library will return a Pagination object which abstracts all this into a single iterator. The pagination object will request "next links" as soon as they are needed.
trans-unit.target: When this is the case, the methods in this library will return a Pagination object which abstracts all this into a single iterator. The pagination object will request "next links" as soon as they are needed.

trans-unit.source: When to use one or the other and requirements:
trans-unit.target: 何时使用一种或另一种以及要求。

trans-unit.source: When using certain methods you will have the option to specify not only a limit option (the number of items to be returned) but a batch option. This option will indicate the method to request data to the api in batches until the limit is reached or the data consumed. This is usefull when you want to optimize memory or network latency.
trans-unit.target: 当使用某些方法时,您不仅可以指定一个限制选项(要返回的项目数量),还可以指定一个批次选项。这个选项将指示向api批量请求数据的方法,直到达到限制或数据被消耗。当你想优化内存或网络延迟时,这个选项很有用。

trans-unit.source: When using certain methods, it is possible that you request more items than the api can return in a single api call. In this case the Api, returns a "next link" url where you can pull more data.
trans-unit.target: 当使用某些方法时,有可能你请求的项目数量超过了api在一次api调用中所能返回的数量。在这种情况下,Api,会返回一个 "下一个链接 "的url,在那里你可以提取更多的数据。

trans-unit.source: When using oauth, you create an application and allow some resources to be accessed and used by its users. These resources are managed with permissions. These can either be delegated (on behalf of a user) or aplication permissions. The former are used when the authentication method is "on behalf of a user". Some of these require administrator consent. The latter when using the "with your own identity" authentication method. All of these require administrator consent.
trans-unit.target: 当使用oauth时,你创建一个应用程序,并允许一些资源被其用户访问和使用。这些资源是通过权限来管理的。这些权限可以是委托的(代表用户),也可以是应用程序的权限。前者在认证方式为 "代表用户 "时使用。其中有些需要管理员同意。后者在使用 "用自己的身份 "认证方式时使用。这些都需要管理员同意。

trans-unit.source: When using the "on behalf of a user" authentication method this is accomplished through the refresh tokens (if and only if you added the "offline_access" permission), but note that a refresh token only lasts for 90 days. So you must use it before or you will need to request a new access token again (no new consent needed by the user, just a login). If your application needs to work for more than 90 days without user interaction and without interacting with the API, then you must implement a periodic call to Connection.refresh_token before the 90 days have passed.
trans-unit.target: When using the "on behalf of a user" authentication method this is accomplished through the refresh tokens (if and only if you added the "offline_access" permission), but note that a refresh token only lasts for 90 days. So you must use it before or you will need to request a new access token again (no new consent needed by the user, just a login). If your application needs to work for more than 90 days without user interaction and without interacting with the API, then you must implement a periodic call to Connection.refresh_token before the 90 days have passed.

trans-unit.source: When using the "on behalf of the user" authentication method, this method call will print a url that the user must visit to give consent to the app on the required permissions.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 "代表用户 "的认证方法时,这个方法调用将打印一个用户必须访问的url,以同意应用在所需权限上。

trans-unit.source: When using the Office 365 API you can filter, order, select, expand or search on some fields. This filtering is tedious as is using Open Data Protocol (OData).
trans-unit.target: When using the Office 365 API you can filter, order, select, expand or search on some fields. This filtering is tedious as is using Open Data Protocol (OData).

trans-unit.source: Whenever a Request error raises, the connection object will raise an exception. Then the exception will be captured and logged it to the stdout with it's message, an return Falsy (None, False, [], etc...)
trans-unit.target: 每当Request出现错误时,连接对象就会引发一个异常。然后异常将被捕获并记录到stdout中,包括它的消息和返回的Falsy(None,False,[],等等...)

trans-unit.source: With the access token retrieved and stored you will be able to perform api calls to the service.
trans-unit.target: 有了检索和存储的访问令牌,你就可以对服务进行api调用。

trans-unit.source: Without admin consent you can only access a few properties of each user such as name and email and litte more. You can search by name or retrieve a contact specifying the complete email.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有管理员的同意,你只能访问每个用户的一些属性,如姓名和电子邮件等。您可以通过姓名搜索或检索指定完整的电子邮件的联系人。

trans-unit.source: Working with saved emails is also easy:
trans-unit.target: 使用已保存的电子邮件也很容易。

trans-unit.source: Write down the Application (client) ID. You will need this value.
trans-unit.target: 写下应用程序(客户端)ID。您将需要这个值。

trans-unit.source: You can also search content. As said in the graph docs:
trans-unit.target: 你也可以搜索内容。如图文档中所说。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify specific data to be retrieved with "select":
trans-unit.target: 你也可以用 "选择 "来指定要检索的特定数据。

trans-unit.source: You can also work with share permissions:
trans-unit.target: 你也可以用共享权限工作。

trans-unit.source: You can authenticate using a console. The best way to achieve this is by using the authenticate method of the Account class.
trans-unit.target: You can authenticate using a console. The best way to achieve this is by using the authenticate method of the Account class.

trans-unit.source: You can authenticate your users in a web environment by following this steps:
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过以下步骤在网络环境中验证您的用户。

trans-unit.source: You can choose where and how to store tokens by using the proper Token Backend.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过使用适当的代币后端选择存储代币的位置和方式。

trans-unit.source: You can currently search only message and person collections. A $search request returns up to 250 results. You cannot use $filter or $orderby in a search request.
trans-unit.target: 您目前只能搜索消息和个人收藏。一个$search请求最多返回250个结果。你不能在搜索请求中使用$filter或$orderby。

trans-unit.source: You can get any folder in your address book by requesting child folders or filtering by name.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过请求子文件夹或按名称过滤来获取通讯录中的任何文件夹。

trans-unit.source: You can get any folder in your mailbox by requesting child folders or filtering by name.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过请求子文件夹或按名称过滤来获取邮箱中的任何文件夹。

trans-unit.source: You can get the same scopes as before using protocols and scope helpers like this:
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用这样的协议和范围助手来获得和以前一样的范围。

trans-unit.source: You can however change this when creating the Workbook instance:
trans-unit.target: You can however change this when creating the Workbook instance:

trans-unit.source: You can implement your own protocols by inheriting from Protocol to communicate with other Microsoft APIs.
trans-unit.target: You can implement your own protocols by inheriting from Protocol to communicate with other Microsoft APIs.

trans-unit.source: You can instantiate and use protocols like this:
trans-unit.target: 你可以像这样实例化和使用协议。

trans-unit.source: You can interact with new excel files (.xlsx) stored in OneDrive or a Sharepoint Document Library. You can retrieve workbooks, worksheets, tables, and even cell data. You can also write to any excel online.
trans-unit.target: 您可以与存储在OneDrive或Sharepoint文档库中的新excel文件(.xlsx)进行交互。您可以检索工作簿、工作表、表格,甚至单元格数据。您还可以在线写入任何excel。

trans-unit.source: You can only authenticate using oauth athentication as Microsoft deprecated basic auth on November 1st 2018.
trans-unit.target: 你只能使用oauth athentication进行认证,因为微软在2018年11月1日取消了基本的auth。

trans-unit.source: You can pass "protocol scopes" (like: "https://graph.microsoft.com/Calendars.ReadWrite") to the method or use "scope helpers" like ("message_all"). If you pass protocol scopes, then the account instance must be initialized with the same protocol used by the scopes. By using scope helpers you can abstract the protocol from the scopes and let this library work for you.
trans-unit.target: You can pass "protocol scopes" (like: "https://graph.microsoft.com/Calendars.ReadWrite") to the method or use "scope helpers" like ("message_all"). If you pass protocol scopes, then the account instance must be initialized with the same protocol used by the scopes. By using scope helpers you can abstract the protocol from the scopes and let this library work for you.

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve message headers by doing this:
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过这样做来检索消息头。

trans-unit.source: You can retrive, update, create and delete outlook categories. These categories can be used to categorize Messages, Events and Contacts.
trans-unit.target: 您可以检索、更新、创建和删除Outlook类别。这些类别可用于对信息、事件和联系人进行分类。

trans-unit.source: You can send inline images by doing this:
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过这样的方式发送内嵌图片。

trans-unit.source: You can use one or the other:
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用一个或另一个。

trans-unit.source: You can work only with the required pieces:
trans-unit.target: 你只能用所需的部件工作。

trans-unit.source: add the application permissions for Microsoft Graph you want.
trans-unit.target: add the application permissions for Microsoft Graph you want.

trans-unit.source: add the delegated permissions for Microsoft Graph you want (see scopes).
trans-unit.target: add the delegated permissions for Microsoft Graph you want (see scopes).
